com.k2.Proxy

Interface TypedInvocationHandler<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class of the proxied object
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LinkedInvocationHandler<T>, TargettedInvocationHandler<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLinkedInvocationHandler, AbstractTargettedInvocationHandler, AbstractTestingLinkedInvocationHandler, AbstractTestingTargettedInvocationHandler, TestLoggerLinkedInvocationHandler, TestLoggerTargettedInvocationHandler, TestMutatorLinkedInvocationHandler, TestMutatorTargettedInvocationHandler

    public interface TypedInvocationHandler<T>
extends java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
    A typed invocation handler handles method invocations on proxies for a given proxied type
    Author:
    simon
